Text.Name: SYS_LOASBUILDING
Text.Desc: A lost building that nobody recognizes. \n(Empty)

Text.Name: FillSoil
Text.Desc: Reconstruct an area into soil. This work will take a long time.

Text.Name: FillFertileSoil
Text.Desc: Reconstruct a ground area into fertile soil. This work will take a long time.

Text.Name: FillShallowWater
Text.Desc: Reconstruct a ground area into shallow water. This work will take a long time.

Text.Name: FillBuild_Hide
Text.Desc: A hidden building, used to refresh the surface of the earth.

Text.Name: FillBuild_Empty
Text.Desc: Hidden building used for positioning.

Text.Name: HideBuild_Empty
Text.Desc: Hidden building used for positioning, it's meaningless otherwise

Text.Name: Building_SwordTower
Text.Desc: A huge tower underground, seems to be used to suppress something.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Interact
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to interact with it with your Perception.
